attributes.action: Equalise the tax on heating oil and transport fuel, since they emit the same CO2
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Burning a litre of heating oil emits roughly the same CO2 as burning a litre of diesel or petrol fuel in a car, van or lorry.

If the government means what is says about taxing to be "green" then fuel tax should be applied to heating oil as well as transport.
